mapper.select: SELECT notice_id noticeId, member_id memberId, notice_title noticeTitle, notice_content noticeContent, notice_date noticeDate FROM notice ORDER BY notice_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice( member_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_date ) values( #{memberId}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT member_id memberId, notice_id noticeId, notice_title noticeTitle, notice_content noticeContent, notice_date noticeDate FROM notice WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
